headline: ‘Truly a moron’: Elon Musk escalates spat with Trump adviser Peter Navarro over tariffs
summary: Elon Musk took another jab at President Donald Trump’s senior trade adviser Peter Navarro Tuesday, calling him a “moron” on social media as the Tesla CEO further splits from the White House’s tariffs plan.

raw.headline: ‘Truly a moron’: Elon Musk escalates spat with Trump adviser Peter Navarro over tariffs

headline: FBI looking into Tesla Supercharger damage incident, latest in series of vandalism acts
summary: Electrek first reported the incident, saying an "explosion" led to a temporary shutdown of the charging station.  "We are aware of the incident and are working with our partners to determine exactly what happened," the FBI told Reuters in an email.  The police department in Lacey, where the incident occurred, said in a Facebook post: "This morning at 1:34, officers were dispatched to a malicious mischief after receiving multiple calls reporting a loud noise in the Sleater Kinney area."

raw.headline: FBI looking into Tesla Supercharger damage incident, latest in series of vandalism acts
raw.summary: Electrek first reported the incident, saying an "explosion" led to a temporary shutdown of the charging station.  "We are aware of the incident and are working with our partners to determine exactly what happened," the FBI told Reuters in an email. headline: BYD Stock Soars. It’s Catching Up to Tesla in Yet Another Way.
summary: Better-than-expected financial results led to BYD stock’s jump.  Tesla, run by CEO Elon Musk, is expected to make almost $1.4 billion in the equivalent quarter.  Tesla delivered about 337,000 vehicles, down 13% year over year.

headline: Tesla, Amazon, and Apple forfeit gains after fleeting Magnificent 7 stock rally

headline: Musk-Navarro Spat Escalates as Tesla CEO Calls Trade Adviser a 'Moron'
summary: Things are getting pretty testy between Elon Musk and Trump's top trade adviser Peter Navarro.  Musk, a senior adviser to Trump on slashing the federal government, called Navarro "truly a moron" and "dumber than a sack of bricks," in social media posts that responded to Navarro's televised comment that the Tesla CEO was merely a car "assembler," using auto parts from around the world, rather than a car manufacturer.  In the CNBC clip posted to X, Navarro said it was bad for U.S. economic security to have cars assembled in the U.S. using foreign parts.

raw.headline: Musk-Navarro Spat Escalates as Tesla CEO Calls Trade Adviser a 'Moron'
raw.summary: Things are getting pretty testy between Elon Musk and Trump's top trade adviser Peter Navarro.  Musk, a senior adviser to Trump on slashing the federal government, called Navarro "truly a moron" and "dumber than a sack of bricks," in social media posts that responded to Navarro's televised comment that the Tesla CEO was merely a car "assembler," using auto parts from around the world, rather than a car manufacturer.  In the CNBC clip posted to X, Navarro said it was bad for U.S. economic security to have cars assembled in the U.S. using foreign parts.
